reviewText: Loved this movie as a kid. My daughter enjoyed it too. It arrived in a timely fashion.
This is a very funny movie.  I loved it.  Bought it for my grandchildren, however, they have not viewed it.
Product was delivered on time and met description.

Cute movie. I do not agree that it rewards bad behavior in kids. Children are NOT that silly as to believe that they should behave this way. It is shear entertainment and I had fun watching it with an 8 and 6 year old.
Some grown ups are so hysterically dramatic. Sheesh.

this is a awesome movie. this is a great family film the actors are great the story is great and the humor is great. just a great movie to watch and I love turnchbull probably one of my favorite movie villians to date. if you have not seen this movie then I recommend you do
I had the VHS tape on this also and I decided to buy the DVD
My two granddaughters and I watched this movie and loved it!  I am sure we will watch it over and over again!
I have always loved this movies!! I used to watch this as many times as a child!! Brought back so many memories!!!
Very good movie.  Closely follows the broadway play regarding life's lessons.
Great family movie for every age. My son loved the book and later loved the movie as well.
a very enjoyable family movie.  My grandchildren, ages 10 and 9 really enjoy watching it.
One of my favorite movies. Wish I could get it on bluray.
Received much sooner than expected.  Good job
